name: pmem.io
body:
### Persistent Memory Programming

Here you'll find information on Persistent Memory Programming, including links to libraries, sample code, operating system enabling projects, publications, etc.

### Note: These are works in progress... stay tuned!

* [NVML](/nvml) -- Non-Volatile Memory Libraries for using Persistent Memory on Linux
* [Linux Examples](/linux-examples) -- Some Educational Examples, Written for Linux
* [NVDIMM Framework](https://github.com/01org/nvdimm-framework) -- A pluggable framework for NVDIMMS
* [PRD](https://github.com/01org/prd) -- The Persistent RAM Driver + ext4 Direct Access (DAX)

### Contact
For more information, contact [andy.rudoff@intel.com](mailto:andy.rudoff@intel.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
